Status in development, release candidate
Entered by Elise
Last reviewed by Oana
Metaphor Program Alias Movement Downward

Metaphors that use this frame:

as Target frame as Source frame
  • BECOMING IMPOVERISHED IS MOVING DOWNWARDS
  • DECREASE IN QUANTITY IS DOWNWARD MOTION
  • DOING EVIL IS FALLING
  • WORSENING MOOD IS DOWNWARD MOTION
